name: Synaptic Resonance Amplifier
description: A neural implant that allows the user to sense and manipulate electromagnetic frequencies, turning their mind into a living radio receiver.

flavor.rationale: The Synaptic Resonance Amplifier was originally developed for military communications but found its way onto the black market when a rogue engineer sold them to independent contractors. Now it's used by hackers who want to eavesdrop on secure channels or amplify signals to overload systems.
